paths.title: Frontend Developer Path
paths.description: Learn how to create interactive websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

modules.title: HTML & CSS Basics
modules.description: Learn the basics of HTML and CSS to create well-structured web pages.

modules.title: JavaScript for Beginners
modules.description: Understand the fundamentals of JavaScript and how to make websites dynamic.

modules.title: Advanced CSS Techniques
modules.description: Learn how to create responsive designs and modern layouts using CSS.

paths.title: Backend Developer Path
paths.description: Master the skills required to build robust server-side applications.

modules.title: Node.js Fundamentals
modules.description: Get started with Node.js and learn how to create server-side applications.

modules.title: Database Management
modules.description: Learn how to design and manage databases using SQL and NoSQL technologies.

modules.title: RESTful APIs
modules.description: Understand how to build and consume RESTful APIs for modern web applications.

paths.title: Full Stack Developer Path
paths.description: Become a full-stack developer by mastering both frontend and backend technologies.

modules.title: Frontend with React
modules.description: Learn how to build modern frontend applications using React.

modules.title: Backend with Express.js
modules.description: Build server-side applications and REST APIs using Express.js.

modules.title: Connecting Frontend and Backend
modules.description: Learn how to integrate frontend and backend to create full-stack applications.
